name: Project Blob
description:
Project Blob is centered around the idea that home is not just a place, it's the people who matter to you most that makes a place a true home. In this way, this game embodies the theme of home, demonstrating that no matter where you are, you'll always be at home with the people you have around you. This is represented through the experience presented to the players, giving them a real connection to the blobs as they search for a new seasonal home and watch their blob families grow with each passing season.

Controls:

XBOX 360:

Move: Left Stick

Jump: A

Pause: Start

Keyboard:

Move: W, A, S, D

Jump: Spacebar

Pause: Escape

Credits:

Lead Designer/3D Artist: Zac Dickinson

Project Manager/Designer: Bailey Fitness

Programer/2D Artist: Kirsty Tschirpig

Programer: Alex Bryant

Composer & Sound Design : Jolon Silk
